com.moniuliuma.android.notification

Class NotificationLights

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moniuliuma.android.notification.NotificationLights

  • public class NotificationLights
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides access to leds related methods of the terminal.

    • Method Detail

      • indicatorLed

        public int indicatorLed(int color,
                        int onoff)
        Setting led method. This method turns on or off a led without blocking the caller thread.
        Parameters:
        color - id - Specifies which LED to control.
        onoff - A value of 1 enables the LED and a value of 0 disables the LED.
        Returns:
        0 success, -1 is failed.

      • startBlink

        public void startBlink(int color,
                       long delayTurnOn,
                       long delayTurnOff,
                       int counts)
        Blinking led method. This method start blinking a led without blocking the caller thread.
        Parameters:
        color - Specifies which LED to control.
        delayTurnOn - Specifies how long (in ms) during an on/off cycle the LED should be turned on. If set to zero, the LED is simply turned off.
        delayTurnOff - Specifies how long (in ms) during an on/off cycle the LED should be turned off. If set to zero, the LED remains on until all cycles are complete.
        counts - Specifies how many on/off cycles should be performed before the LED is turned off. If set to zero, then the LED is turned off immediately. If set to -1, the LED is cycled until it is explicitly turned off.

      • cancelBlink

        public void cancelBlink()
        cancel the current blinking LED.

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
